sourcesContent:
export const products = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Fresh Cow Milk",
    description: "Pure, organic cow milk delivered fresh from our farms",
    price: "₹60",
    image: "https://th.bing.com/th/id/R.c6f5490fd8f80fcecbee0ffabb0f7047?rik=z3t%2fOLCfda9FLg&riu=http%3a%2f%2fwww.nandhaadairyfarm.com%2fmedia%2flarge%2f421_bs2.jpg&ehk=xfPfGkFYabw%2fOlPCzfS3hQSU0bmPgklGdFXmfYAc9pQ%3d&risl=&pid=ImgRaw&r=0",
    category: "milk"
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Homemade Curd",
    description: "Traditional homemade curd with rich, creamy texture",
    price: "₹45",
    image: "https://3.imimg.com/data3/XF/VD/MY-5497698/pure-curd-500x500.png",
    category: "curd"
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: "Pure Ghee",
    description: "Clarified butter made from pure cow milk",
    price: "₹550",
    image: "https://tse2.mm.bing.net/th/id/OIP.yFUbW84jf1axEf2xSIzf8QAAAA?rs=1&pid=ImgDetMain&o=7&rm=3",
    category: "ghee"
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    name: "Fresh Paneer",
    description: "Soft, fresh paneer perfect for cooking",
    price: "₹180",
    image: "https://5.imimg.com/data5/SELLER/Default/2020/10/BH/GW/YR/14340861/600x600-jpg-500x500.jpg",
    category: "paneer"
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    name: "Buffalo Milk",
    description: "Rich and creamy buffalo milk with higher fat content",
    price: "₹75",
    image: "https://img1.exportersindia.com/product_images/bc-full/2021/2/8515453/buffalo-milk-1613538607-5726632.jpeg",
    category: "milk"
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    name: "Butter",
    description: "Fresh, unsalted butter made from pure cream",
    price: "₹120",
    image: "https://manoramagroup.co.in/img/og-banners/Personal_Care_Applications/Butter/organic_butter_banner.jpg",
    category: "butter"
  }
];

export const testimonials = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Sarah Johnson",
    role: "Home Chef",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108755-2616b612b786?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face",
    text: "The quality of Moolala's dairy products is exceptional. Their milk is the freshest I've ever tasted!"
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Michael Chen",
    role: "Restaurant Owner",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face",
    text: "We've been using Moolala products for our restaurant for over a year. Our customers love the taste!"
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: "Emma Davis",
    role: "Health Enthusiast",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face",
    text: "As someone who's health-conscious, I appreciate Moolala's commitment to organic, pure dairy products."
  }
];

export const recipes = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Homemade Paneer Curry",
    description: "A delicious curry made with fresh paneer and aromatic spices",
    image: "https://tse3.mm.bing.net/th/id/OIP.Ybwv0iJrsM9_tfePzc2wywAAAA?rs=1&pid=ImgDetMain&o=7&rm=3",
    time: "30 mins",
    difficulty: "Easy",
    details: [
      "Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds and let them splutter.",
      "Add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.",
      "Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a minute.",
      "Add tomatoes, turmeric, red chili powder, coriander powder, and salt. Cook until oil separates.",
      "Add paneer cubes and mix gently.",
      "Add a little water, cover, and simmer for 5 minutes.",
      "Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot with roti or rice."
    ]
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Ghee Rice",
    description: "Fragrant rice cooked with pure ghee and whole spices",
    image: "https://www.indianveggiedelight.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/instant-pot-ghee-rice-recipe-featured.jpg",
    time: "25 mins",
    difficulty: "Medium",
    details: [
      "Wash and soak basmati rice for 20 minutes, then drain.",
      "Heat ghee in a pan, add whole spices (bay leaf, cinnamon, cloves, cardamom).",
      "Add sliced onions and sauté until golden.",
      "Add drained rice and sauté for 2 minutes.",
      "Add water and salt, bring to a boil.",
      "Cover and cook on low heat until rice is done and fluffy.",
      "Garnish with fried cashews and serve hot."
    ]
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: "Curd Rice",
    description: "Cooling curd rice perfect for hot summer days",
    image: "https://alchetron.com/cdn/curd-rice-1290d065-6ac6-4a23-a886-0583cfb91c3-resize-750.jpeg",
    time: "15 mins",
    difficulty: "Easy",
    details: [
      "Cook rice and let it cool to room temperature.",
      "Mash the rice slightly and add fresh curd (yogurt).",
      "Add salt and mix well.",
      "Heat oil, add mustard seeds, urad dal, curry leaves, and green chilies for tempering.",
      "Pour the tempering over the curd rice and mix.",
      "Garnish with coriander and serve chilled."
    ]
  }
];
